run() - Method in class es.csic.iiia.bms.factors.VariableFactor
Computes and sends the messages of this factor, using the formula: \nu_{n_i} = [ \sum_{n_j \in N} \nu_{n_j} ] - \nu_{n_i} where N is the set of neighbors of this factor.
